casebody.data:
Fred WALLY, Lavon Benton, Don Crowe, and George Martocchio.
v.
The CITY OF KANNAPOLIS, a North Carolina Municipal Corporation. No. 58P15. Supreme Court of North Carolina. Aug. 20, 2015. T.C. Morphis, Jr., Hickory, for Wally, Fred, et al. Keith J. Merritt, Charlotte, for City of Kannapolis. Rebecca K. Cheney, Charlotte, for City of Kannapolis. Melanie J. Raubach, Charlotte, for City of Kannapolis.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed on the 4th of February 2015 by Plaintiffs in this matter for discretionary review of the decision of the North Carolina Court of Appeals pursuant to G.S. 7A-31, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 20th of August 2015."
Ervin, J. recused.
